entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @pulte @JeffreeStar god i would do anything for that money :// my life is so shit and this amount of money would help my family so much. i can’t work because of coronavirus my workplace is closed so i can’t help my mum financially which means that she has to do so many hours of hard physical work
